history.proof: intros. srun best use: rel_prime_mult, is_gcd_sym.

original: intros. intros H1 H2. unfold is_gcd in *. unfold is_gcd in H1. unfold is_gcd in H2. unfold "<d" in *. destruct H1 as [Hpq1 [Hpql Hpqk1]]. destruct H2 as [Hpl1 [Hpl2 Hpl3]]. split. - split. + apply (proj1 Hpq1). + split. * apply (proj1 Hpql). * intros k Hk1 Hk2. destruct (proj2 Hpq1 k Hk1 Hk2) as [_ Hk3]. apply Hk3. - unfold "<d". split. + apply (proj1 Hpl1). + split. * apply (proj1 Hpl2). * intros k Hk1 Hk2. destruct (proj2 Hpl1 k Hk1 Hk2) as [Hk3 _]. apply Hk3.
